title: Sword of Venus 1953 (Adventure, Romance) Robert Clarke, Catherine McLeod, Dan O'Herlihy | Colorized

sources.title: Sword of Venus 1953 (Adventure, Romance) Robert Clarke, Catherine McLeod, Dan O'Herlihy | Colorized
sources.description:
A young nobleman, the son of the legendary Count of Monte Cristo, finds himself ensnared in a web of deceit and treachery when he's falsely accused of a crime he didn't commit. With his family's honor and fortune at stake, he must navigate a dangerous game of intrigue and betrayal to clear his name and thwart the sinister ambitions of his father's sworn enemy.

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/M6vI8jQhPtI


Original title: Sword of Venus (1953) AKA: Island of Monte Cristo
This film is available with subtitles in many language options.

Director: Harold Daniels
Writers: Jack Pollexfen, Aubrey Wisberg
Stars: Robert Clarke, Catherine McLeod, Dan O'Herlihy 
Genres: Colorized Classic, Adventure, Crime, Romance


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
09:11 A duel ensues between Dantes and Louis over fidelity issues, with a surprising outcome.
12:00 Intrigue and deception unfold as characters plan to destroy the heir of Monte Cristo.
18:45 A tale of deception, betrayal, and intrigue unfolds in a remote inn during a stormy night.
28:10 A murder trial unfolds with hidden identities, legal manipulation, and a desperate plea for help.
34:08 A dramatic turn of events unfolds as a man faces trial, bribery, and a surprise wedding night in prison.
43:26 Intrigue and betrayal unfold as a prisoner escapes and plans are made to ensure his silence in a colorized adventure film.
51:43 Deception and intrigue unfold as a man is mistaken for a deceased heir and a plan is set in motion to secure a fortune.
58:53 Intrigue and deception unfold as a man assumes a new identity to seek revenge and reclaim his fortune.
1:06:11 Intrigue and betrayal unfold as a man seeks revenge and uncovers a sinister plot during a high-stakes business deal.
